name: Draymoor Botanical Gardens
description: Wander among vibrant flower displays, rare plants, and serene walking paths — perfect for a relaxing afternoon.

name: Silverstream River Kayaking
description: Enjoy a gentle paddle down the scenic Silverstream, with stunning views of forested hills and local wildlife.

name: Draymoor Artisan Market
description: Every Saturday, local artists, bakers, and craftsmen gather to sell handmade goods and delicious treats.

name: Maple Lane Bistro
description: Savor farm-to-table dishes inspired by Draymoor's fresh produce and regional recipes.

name: Whispering Pines Trail
description: A moderate hiking path with sweeping views, shaded forest sections, and a lookout tower at the summit.

name: Annual Lantern Festival
description: Watch hundreds of lanterns float into the night sky, accompanied by live music and food stalls.

name: Draymoor History Museum
description: Learn about the town's founding, mining heritage, and cultural traditions through interactive exhibits.

name: Brookside Park
description: Picnic areas, playgrounds, a small petting zoo, and seasonal outdoor movie nights make this a family favorite.

name: The Book Nook Café
description: Relax with a latte and browse a selection of local author books in this cozy community gathering spot.
